endpoints.description: Add a new industrial good item to the inventory system.
Retrieve the complete list of items currently held in inventory.
Fetch the details of a specific item identified by its unique ID.
Update details of an item identified by its unique ID.
Remove a specific item from the inventory by its unique ID.
Create a new order for industrial goods from the existing inventory.
Retrieve a list of all orders processed by the service.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific order by its unique ID.
Update order details for a specific order identified by its unique ID.
Plan and generate optimal transportation routes for goods delivery.
